name: A Discovery Of Ancient Tech Of Time
description:
In a forgotten city called Metahill in 2021 after a pandemic that never ends, the entire population chooses to flee to another island that still has forests and glorious culture to live and preserve. All researchers, doctors, soldiers are busy saving themselves instead of looking for solutions.

But there is a middle-aged scientist who is abandoned by his friendship and dumped by the institution he has been defending. He felt that there was still hope for this city even though it was only equipped with a strong curiosity and the remains of ancient ruins in the sewers of Metahill City. He believes that real healing does not come from biological, religious or generic chemical forces that are available in various corners of clinics provided by the government.

Vaccines don't work, drugs don't work, people lose hope... the only way is to turn back time! Only with a 1,000 watt power supply, a female japanese dolphin, a gaming grade computer and a mysterious nameless statue down there.
Sounds ridiculous, but this is humanity's last hope. 

WEll, the old wisdom said, "TIME WILL HEAL", right? but it will not heal by itself.

(the end)
